Classifier Class Reference

Class containing a Naive Bayesian classifier. Class contains a Naive Bayesian classifier from faif library and provides methods for creating and training the classifier and later classifyinf given examples. More...

Detailed Description

Class containing a Naive Bayesian classifier. Class contains a Naive Bayesian classifier from faif library and provides methods for creating and training the classifier and later classifyinf given examples.

Definition at line 27 of file classifier.h.

Member Function Documentation

std::string Classifier::classify ( std::string  example)

Method classifying a given test example. Loads the example from the given file into the internal faif::ml::NaiveBayesian<faif::ValueNominal<int>>ExampleTest object.

Parameters
examplename of the file with the test example

Definition at line 123 of file classifier.cpp.

void Classifier::init ( std::string  attributes,
std::string  categories,
std::string  examples_dir,
int  examples_num 
)

Method for classifier initialization. Initializes the classifier with given attribute list, categories and trains the classifier on a number of examples in the given directory.

Parameters
attributesname of the file listing all attributes
categoriesname of the file listing all categories
examples_dirdirectory containing examples
examples_numnumber of examples to be used (and available in the examples_dir)

void Classifier::loadAttributes ( std::string  attributes)

Method loading attributes from a given file. Loads attributes from the given file into the internal faif::ml::NaiveBayesian<faif::ValueNominal<int>>Domains object.

Parameters
attributesname of the file listing all attributes

void Classifier::loadCategories ( std::string  categories)

void Classifier::loadExample ( std::string  example)

Method loading an example from a given file. Loads an example from the given file into the internal faif::ml::NaiveBayesian<faif::ValueNominal<int>>ExamplesTrain object.

Parameters
examplename of the file with the example
